events.message: I would like to request a refund because the product I ordered doesn't match the description and I am very disappointed.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product received.
Assigning the case to refund department staff to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund, and I'm here to assist you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can proceed with your request?
The order number is 123456789. The item arrived damaged and is nothing like described on your website.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can offer you a full refund or send a replacement product immediately. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to receive a full refund as I no longer want the product. Thank you for your quick response.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing this case now as the refund has been confirmed received and the customer has no further questions.
